etymologies: mid 16th century: from Spanish guayaba, probably from Taino

definitions: an edible, pale orange tropical fruit with pink juicy flesh and a strong sweet aroma.
shortDefinitions: edible, pale orange tropical fruit with pink juicy flesh

definitions: the small tropical American tree that bears the guava.

notes.text: Genus Psidium, family Myrtaceae: several species, in particular P. guajava

shortDefinitions: small tropical American tree which bears guavas
